name: Constellation Staked RPL
description: Constellation liquidizes the node operator bond for Rocket Pool, opening it up to external investors via tokens called xrETH and xRPL. The ETH and RPL deposits used to mint these tokens are used by the Constellation smart contracts to create new minipools on Rocket Pool which are operated non-custodially by NodeSet decentralized operators, each of whom is is required to meet and maintain professional performance standards to ensure maximum returns for Constellation's users.
